summary: Cyrus & TJ - Two Cultures, Two Hearts, One Winter (1/?) [INTERACTIVE STORY]
title: Cyrus & TJ - Two Cultures, Two Hearts, One Winter (1/?) [INTERACTIVE STORY]
body:
One  winter day at The Spoon…

“Hey Cyrus.” TJ walks up to Cyrus’ spot at the counter.

“Hey TJ, long time no see, buddy o’ mine.” Cyrus says, “Where have you been lately?”

“Well I haven’t been swinging if that’s what you mean.” TJ jokingly said, “Hey what are you doing for Christmas?”

Cyrus thought TJ new since he was at his Bar Mitzvah, but I guess not, “Jewish people celebrate Hannukah.”

“You’re Jewish?” He asks.

“Jewish people celebrate Bar Mitzvahs.” Cyrus says to reassure him.

“Yeah, sorry. Well what do you wanna do during this Holiday Season?”

“Hmmm?…”

LINK IN COMMENTS

Former Andi Mack Blog now an official Libby Stan Blog

Talk to me about Niris, Ambi, Walrus, and Monah.

Where did Andi’s scooter go? Did it disappear just like my hopes and dreams. Join me in my efforts to spread the good word about Monah.

Jyrus or Tyrus? I think you mean Niris or Ambi.

Kip runs a Tyrus blog and no one can convince me otherwise.

Nobody in this show is straight despite what the Disney propagandists may tell you

summary: Things are scalating for the worse in this disturbing morning, where people are already calling Andi a "dumb b*tch" and saying...
question: Things are scalating for the worse in this disturbing morning, where people are already calling Andi a "dumb b*tch" and saying she needs to chill. When did the world become like this? In what Universe is someone a "dumb b*tch" for being a good friend and worrying about her friends safety? Sadly, it appears to be the Universe we live in...
answer:
I haven’t checked the tag in a bit, and while I’m sure it’s more of a vocal minority than any sort of majority, it’s wild that anyone at all would be mad at Andi in this situation. I don’t care how much you stan your “soft boy uwu” TJ, the fact is he brought Cyrus to a dangerous situation. And even if he does end up being the one who reported the gun (just my guess for now, we need to see 3x07), no one knows that, especially not Andi. From Andi’s perspective, TJ is this jerk who was first mean to Buffy and now brought Cyrus somewhere where guns were involved and Cyrus felt unsafe. She has every right to be upset at TJ and want to protect Cyrus from him.

TJ’s redemption arc was never going to be linear. He’s got some more work to do and I’m sure he’ll do it, but right now Andi’s feelings are very valid

summary: Here’s Disney Channel’s schedule for Next Week, November 26-December 2. Next Week, there’s Network Premieres of Elena of Avalor,...
caption:
Here’s Disney Channel’s schedule for Next Week, November 26-December 2. Next Week, there’s Network Premieres of Elena of Avalor, Doc McStuffins, Lego Star Wars: All Stars, Milo Murphy’s Law and Vampirina. Plus, New Episodes of Andi Mack, Coop & Cami Ask the World, DuckTales, Fancy Nancy, Mickey and the Roadster Racers, Muppet Babies, Puppy Dog Pals, Raven’s Home and Star Wars Resistance.

Next Saturday, is the Start of 25 Days of Christmas for all the Disney Networks with Holiday Specials and Movies like Mickey’s Once Upon a Christmas for example, throughout the Month. Next Saturday, is also the premiere of the Special: Disney Parks Presents a 25 Days of Christmas Holiday Party.

blog.description: ash || 22 || they/them || header by @ cookies-n-creme ♡

summary: While literally staring out at the sea, I realized how firmly Swing Scene 2.0 (Tyrus reconciliation) is implanted in my head......
body:
While literally staring out at the sea, I realized how firmly Swing Scene 2.0 (Tyrus reconciliation) is implanted in my head…

It’s such a perfect idea, and if it doesn’t actually happen on the show, I’m gonna need some canon divergence fic, stat.
